doc.previous: This is a list of accidents and incidents involving Lufthansa mainline aircraft since 1954 For earlier occurrences refer to Deutsche Luft Hansa For accidents and incidents on Lufthansa branded flights which were operated by other airlines see the respective articles Lufthansa CityLine Lufthansa Cargo Contact Air Germanwings and Air Dolomiti
